General.Name: Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk operates as a construction service and property development company in Indonesia. The company engages in the construction of apartments, hotels, malls, factories, hospitals, residential, infrastructure, dormitory, and commercial and office buildings. It also constructs landed houses, as well as education center, worship house, toll roads, flyovers, and bridges; and develops real estate properties. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT Totalindo Eka Persada Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Totalindo Investama Persada.
General.Address: Jl. Tebet Raya No. 14 A, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12810
